DOC.brief_summary: Experiment in the test tube indicated that CP-945,598 becomes less soluble with increase of pH (less acidity). Changes in stomach acid levels may affect the solubility of CP-945,598, therefore, alters its availability in the blood. Omeprazole decreases acid levels in stomach. This study will compare the time course of drug concentrations in the body, safety, and tolerability of CP-945,598 given with and without omeprazole.
DOC.brief_title: Study Examing The Effect Of Omeprazole On Safety, Tolerability And How The Body Processes An Experimental Drug
DOC.criteria: Healthy Body Mass Index (BMI) of 26.6 to 40.5 kg/m2. Nonprescribed use of drugs or abuse of recreational drugs; recent treatment with experimental drugs or herbal experiments; EKG and blood pressure measurements falling outside of protocolspecified limits; history of regular alcohol or tobacco use exceeding protocolspecified limits; medically important health conditions; recent use of prescription or nonprescription medications.
